function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Modeling risk of cases occurring in specific grid cells","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Using mobile phone call data records to analyze population movement","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of travel history information from patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of covariate data from populated areas with confirmed cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of locations with few cases from mapping analysis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"De-identified data on malaria cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of geolocated data for mapping malaria risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission season data collection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of movement data with case-based risk maps for namibia creates a dynamic framework for understanding connectivity between malaria risk areas.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Achieving malaria elimination in namibia by 2020 requires a clearly defined strategy to deploy resources effectively.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Targeting aggressive attack measures to source communities and implementing sustainable measures in sink regions is essential for reducing malaria transmission in namibia.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Asymptomatic infections leading to undetected transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of human movement patterns","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Mismatch of measures and locations for disease elimination","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Insufficient targeted operations for identifying and managing asymptomatic and symptomatic infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate and untimely creation of risk maps for elimination programmes","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Lack of capacity to rapidly provide diagnostically confirmed malaria incidence in very low transmission environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in credit guarantee ratio during the emergency stage of covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Establishment of regional credit guarantee scheme in asean","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration of social risk in policy development","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Varying credit guarantee ratios for different countries and banks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased credit guarantee ratios in asean member states due to covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in accessing finance for smes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High loan default risk ratio npl/l","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of npl/l increase in the ’emergency stage’ due to unpredictable negative shock to gdp","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differential behavior of banks in the ’new normal’ stage in response to gdp reduction","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Magnitude of bank responses in the ’exit stage’","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unanticipated shock to macroeconomic variables leading to negative or positive responses for npl/l","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on gdp growth affecting npl/l of banks in asean countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transition through different stages of the pandemic affecting gdp and in turn npl/l of banks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Accumulated response of npl/l to variable shocks in singapore banks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Impact of unpredictable shock to gdp on npl/l in philippines banks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Response of npl/l to shocks in malaysia banks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of var approach without considering contagious diseases impact","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unanticipated exogenous shock in the model","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of macroeconomic variables on npl/l without considering health-related factors","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-stationarity of the series, as indicated by the kpss test.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Lack of long-run linkages between macroeconomic variables and bank profile components.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"High npl/l ratios in asean countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent credit guarantee ratios for banks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliability of econometric equations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Close proximity of people during data analysis and discussion.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of shared resources and facilities for conducting analysis.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Empirical analysis based on pca and cluster analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Calculation of soundness based on financial variables","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Preliminary tests for kmo and bartlett tests","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Lack of common opinion on variables for calculating the soundness of banks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Direct impact of banks’ financial performance on their soundness","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of statistical techniques for categorizing banks based on creditworthiness","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate credit guarantee ratio in a recession","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
